#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int n,i;
cin>>n;
int arr[n];
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
cin>>arr[i];
}
int t=0;
while(1)
{
    int k=0;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
if(arr[i]>=i+1)
{
t=t+1;
k=k+1;
}
arr[i]=arr[i]-i-1;
}
if(k==0)
    break;
}
if(t%2==0)
cout<<"BOB"<<"\n";
else
cout<<"ALICE"<<"\n";
}
}
